name: Furaffinity Sidebar Space Remover
description: This is a code meant to be used in conjoint with this code, it removes the space above the FurAffinity sidebar that is left for ads to be placed there. Sadly though AdBlockPlus may remove the ad it sometimes has trouble removing the space left behind. I had made the attempt to try and remove the space through AdBlock but was not successful. I have only ever tested this on Google Chrome, I'm not sure what effect it will have on other browsers.

user.name: Umbreeunix
user.about:
Not really much of a coder, but I'm working on getting better so whatever codes I end up making will be posted here.

Also nobody needs to send me money through this site, I'm just putting my PayPal email here because... well I just wanted to fill out the info. You can also message me through this email about commissions or whatever, since I'm more of an artist than a coder.
